channel.title: Spanish translation?
channel.description: Just wondering if spanish translation is planned for the future or at least into consideration. I'd love to play this with my friends but none of them speak english. This was probably asked before but I couldn't find it anywhere so I had to ask, all I found was that several translations were planned as a kickstarter stretch goal but since it wasn't reached Im wondering if there is still hope for it.

item.title: Spanish translation?
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
You could ask dev, maybe you can do the spanish translation.

Read full topic

item.title: Spanish translation?
item.dc:creator: Monkke
item.description:
Ehhhh, since most ppl speak english who play, you can’t really do so as you still have to conversate in English. I mean changing the ingame language is not that big of a job I guess, but according to the rules, you must talk in English.

Read full topic
